translation.Our AI platform enables livestock, crop: Our AI platform enables livestock, crop producers and processors to quickly and easily increase efficiency, improve decision making, and increase the revenue. We empower businesses across the value chain to quickly and easily provide all the essential inputs for increasing the crops yields. Our team provides all inputs at the time of sowing and also provides method of using materials. There will be less loss and farmers will get benefited as the inputs from the team will provide knowledge for systematic crop cultivation. Our team provides knowledge for maximum land utilization and how to increase the productivity of land.
translation.Crop Doctor is an android based mobile a: Crop Doctor is an android based mobile application for the farmers in national level. The objective of this application is to wider reach and easy accessibility of crop information and service among farmers.
translation.In views of all things we develop a soft: In views of all things we develop a software that provides all the information from sowing to harvesting . Via this software we will provide weather forecasting data that helps to choose suitable crop , crop pattern, time of irrigation and all needed information regarding cultivation practice.

translation.Name: Name
translation.Suitable soil and weather conditions are: Suitable soil and weather conditions are the most important factors for the cultivation of chillies.
translation.The chilli grows in all soils from light: The chilli grows in all soils from light sandy to heavy clay.
translation.Light soils are good for an early crop,: Light soils are good for an early crop, while clay loam and silt loam soils are well suited for heavy yields .
translation.If the acidic soil is acidic , liming is: If the acidic soil is acidic , liming is required.
translation.Removal of stubbles if any in field plan: Removal of stubbles if any in field planned to cultivate chilli crop.
The chilli is a warm saeason crop.
translation.The crop does well under an average mont: The crop does well under an average monthly temperature of 20 to 25 C.
translation.Long dry spell and heavy rainfall also a: Long dry spell and heavy rainfall also affect on growth and fruiting of plant
translation.Choosing the various type varieties and: Choosing the various type varieties and Seed rate
translation.Manjira, sarangi, Teja , Yeshaswini, Dem: Manjira, sarangi, Teja , Yeshaswini, Demon, Arunim , wonder hot,sitaragold , indica, krithi , goli, Nongwoo, Jewelry, Fito gauri
translation.Nursery soil nare treated with tricoderm: Nursery soil nare treated with tricoderma viridae Or pseudomonas culture 5-6 Days before sowing
translation.For 1m2 of nursery area apply 5kg well r: For 1m2 of nursery area apply 5kg well rotten FYM, DAP @ 50g, and also apply CALDAN @ 2.5g
translation.Dimensions of raised bed is 125-150 cm w: Dimensions of raised bed is 125-150 cm width and length according to use.
translation.Depth of seed is 0.5cm and covered with: Depth of seed is 0.5cm and covered with topsoil and spacing between two lines is 2-2.5 cm
translation.After sowing the seeds, mulch with green: After sowing the seeds, mulch with green leaves and irrigate with rose cane daily in the morning.
translation.Cover the nursery bed with nylon net to: Cover the nursery bed with nylon net to prevent damage by insect and also prevent with climatic effect.
translation.Remove the mulch immediately after germi: Remove the mulch immediately after germination of the seeds.
translation.Weeding should be taken up if weed are p: Weeding should be taken up if weed are present in the nursery.
translation.Saplings will be ready to plant in 5-6 w: Saplings will be ready to plant in 5-6 weeks.
translation.Restrict irrigation one week before tran: Restrict irrigation one week before transplanting and irrigate heavily on the previous day of transplantinmg to harden the seedlings.
translation.A well decomposed FYM @ 12-15 tnns shoul: A well decomposed FYM @ 12-15 tnns should be mixed with biofertilizers @5kg, Tricoderma @2kg , Pseudomonas @2kg and mixing biofertilizers.
translation.Apply FYM fortified with biofertilizers: Apply FYM fortified with biofertilizers for main fields.
translation.Rotavating or cultivating to mix the FYM: Rotavating or cultivating to mix the FYM and soil.
translation.Procurement of fertilizers quantity per: Procurement of fertilizers quantity per acre
translation.Application of fertilizers at the time o: Application of fertilizers at the time of final field preparation (as basal dose)
translation.Procurement Of Drip Irrigation materials: Procurement Of Drip Irrigation materials and mulch paper if required
translation.Water conservation and pest management t: Water conservation and pest management technolongies
translation.Regions with water sparse and integrated: Regions with water sparse and integrated cultivation techniques to conserve water drip irrigation technology are adapted by the farmers.
translation.The seedlings growth in the nursery shou: The seedlings growth in the nursery should be monitotred for pest and disease
translation.Application of basal dose of fertilizers: Application of basal dose of fertilizers and prepare field ready to transplant
translation.Apply basal fertilization during field p: Apply basal fertilization during field preparation justb after before forming ridges / furrows or fund formation.
translation.Formation of ridges / furrows in flood i: Formation of ridges / furrows in flood irrigation method bunds with suitable spacing and setting up the drip
translation.Laying of mulch and making hokles to tra: Laying of mulch and making hokles to transplant with required spacing in drip irrigation method
translation.Irrigate to keep the soil moist enough t: Irrigate to keep the soil moist enough to transplant.
translation.Seedlings are hardened by exposing by ex: Seedlings are hardened by exposing by exposing to an outer tougher enviroonment to make the seedlings grow studier.
translation.The study plants will be strong enough t: The study plants will be strong enough to tolerate the transplanting shock.
translation.The seedlings raised on the seed bed nur: The seedlings raised on the seed bed nursery the hardening may be done by removing the nylon mesh.
translation.Providing water may be reduced to force: Providing water may be reduced to force them to grow stressfully in low moist conditions to get harder .
translation.The age of 35-45 days old seedlings are: The age of 35-45 days old seedlings are suitable to transplant.
translation.Seedlings are uprooted and transplanted: Seedlings are uprooted and transplanted within an hours after uprooting.
translation.The roots of the seedlings are dipped in: The roots of the seedlings are dipped in fungicides and pesticides to prevent any attack of fungal disease and insect attack.
translation.Transplantimg is usually done in the eve: Transplantimg is usually done in the evening hours
translation.Transplanting tools may also be used for: Transplanting tools may also be used for plantimg the seedlings.
translation.Spacing depends on the varities and rang: Spacing depends on the varities and ranges 1 -1.5 feet from the plant to [plant and 2-2.5 feet in between rows.
translation.Irrigation should be provided immediatel: Irrigation should be provided immediately to protect the transplants from moisture stress.
translation.The dead plants if any may be uprooted a: The dead plants if any may be uprooted and gap filling can be carried out in evening hour.
translation.See that protective irrigation is provid: See that protective irrigation is provided for the nes transplant
translation.Manual weeding may be done if required w: Manual weeding may be done if required with the small implements.
translation.Chemical control By using post emergent: Chemical control By using post emergent herbicides like Agil@2ml/l water may be spread.
translation.Weeding Manual weeding may be done if re: Weeding Manual weeding may be done if required with the small implements
translation.Calcium nitrate 25kg +25 kg of urea fort: Calcium nitrate 25kg +25 kg of urea fortified with general liquid may be applied to soil and covered with soil.
translation.Harvesting of the chillies is usually ma: Harvesting of the chillies is usually made accordingly to the use. For preparation of chilli powder and dry chilli the chilli fruits need to be dark red and the fruits are harvested when they turn dark red. The green chilli is harvested for the culinary and even to prepare the pickles. Normally the green chilli may be harvested 8-10 times in a chilli crop and red chillies are harvested 5-6 times.
INSECTS, PEST AND DISEASES OF PLANT.
translation.The collar or the place just above the r: The collar or the place just above the root zone may be subsoil or above the soil parts initially show water-soaked spot, later which develops in to bigger brownish black dead tissue.
translation.On progress of the disease, rotting of t: On progress of the disease, rotting of the collar region occurs and the plant may resist standing up right and may fall off.
translation.Collar or crown rot leads to the rotting: Collar or crown rot leads to the rotting with brownish or blackish spots at the point of infection on the collar or foot of the plant.
translation.The discoloration of the foot or stem ma: The discoloration of the foot or stem may progress on all directions upward, downward or around the stem and once the whole stem is invaded by the pathogen the plants slowly start to wilt or fall off.
translation.The leaves of the respective plants turn: The leaves of the respective plants turn yellow to brown and fall off in some of the plants.
translation.Collar rottening and Root rotting pathog: Collar rottening and Root rotting pathogens require favourable conditions to invade and develop the symptoms.
translation.Over dosage of fertilisers provided in t: Over dosage of fertilisers provided in the soil make more prone to attack of collar rot.
translation.Poor drainage with excess of water in th: Poor drainage with excess of water in the seed bed will leads to attack to collar rot.
translation.Presence of disease-causing pathogens in: Presence of disease-causing pathogens in the seed bed or soil due to poor land preparations cause collar rot.
translation.Soil sanitization, exposure of the soil: Soil sanitization, exposure of the soil to the sunlight after multiple and deep ploughings.
translation.Sanitization helps in killing of any kin: Sanitization helps in killing of any kind of fungi present in the soil before sowing or transplanting.
translation.Application of hyper parasitic organisms: Application of hyper parasitic organisms like Trichoderm viride, Trichoderm harzianum, Pseudomonas fluorescens, Bacillus subtilis, etc to the soil along with well decomposed farm yard manure which can kill these pathogenic organisms like PYTHIUM, FUSARIUM, ALTERNARIA, RHIZOCTONIA, SCLEROTINIA, PHYTOPTHERA, etc.
translation.Taking care of the contamination of grow: Taking care of the contamination of growth media, use of the pathogen or disease-free compost, sanitized implements to prepare the nursery bed, raising seedlings [Protrays, seeders, nets etc] intercultural activities like weeders and other small implements.
translation.Prepare the seed beds with proper draina: Prepare the seed beds with proper drainage, where the seeds will be sown.
translation.Seeds may germinate but seedlings may no: Seeds may germinate but seedlings may not sprout out of the soil and it is generally called as pre-emergence damping-off.hcf
translation.Whereas in case of post emergent damping: Whereas in case of post emergent damping off the sprouted plants wilt or suddenly die.
translation.We can observe poor growth of the sprout: We can observe poor growth of the sprouts with abnormal sized leaves.
Water soaked spots appear on leaves.
translation.We can observe soft and thin discolored: We can observe soft and thin discolored stem which turn black, shrivel and appear like wire stem.
translation.Young plants turn colour from green to g: Young plants turn colour from green to grey, finally black and later wilt, die.
translation.Damping off disease causing pathogens re: Damping off disease causing pathogens require favourable conditions to invade and develop the symptoms.
translation.Over dosage of fertilisers provided in t: Over dosage of fertilisers provided in the soil make more prone to attack of damping off.
translation.Poor drainage with excess of water in th: Poor drainage with excess of water in the seed bed will leads to attack to damping off.
translation.Presence of disease-causing pathogens in: Presence of disease-causing pathogens in the seed bed or soil due to poor land preparations cause damping off.
translation.Poor quality seeds may be untreated, poo: Poor quality seeds may be untreated, poorly treated or expired seeds have more chances of getting killed.
translation.Use of contaminated implements to remove: Use of contaminated implements to remove weeds and take up intercultural operations in seed bed and in the fields.
translation.Poor weed management in the seed beds wh: Poor weed management in the seed beds which may harbour the diseases which leads to damping off.
translation.Improper conditions for seeds to germina: Improper conditions for seeds to germinate.
translation.Provide proper drainage in main field to: Provide proper drainage in main field to avoid water logging where seedlings will be transplanted to avoid the damping off disease in young transplants.
translation.The symptoms appear primarily on foliage: The symptoms appear primarily on foliage as light green to bright yellow lesions on the upper surface of leaf.
translation.The spots enlarge and become necrotic ti: The spots enlarge and become necrotic tissues.
translation.Lesions may be seen on underside of leav: Lesions may be seen on underside of leaves.
translation.Under favourable conditions, dense whiti: Under favourable conditions, dense whitish powdery fungal growth appear on the underside of leaves, causing mild distortions.
translation.Later the fungal growth spread on upper: Later the fungal growth spread on upper side of the leaves also ultimately the entire leaves will wither and die, but they remain attached to the stem.
translation.The symptoms will not appear on fruits o: The symptoms will not appear on fruits or stems, but loss of foliage leads to sunscald.
translation.Loss of foliage reduces the rate of phot: Loss of foliage reduces the rate of photosynthesis ultimately which reduces the yield by 50% and quality of the fruits also will be affected.
translation.The growth of the fungus is favoured by: The growth of the fungus is favoured by low light, with high humidity and moderate temperature.
translation.Greenhouses provide an ideal moist, temp: Greenhouses provide an ideal moist, temperature conditions for rapid spread of the disease.
translation.The pathogen even remains in weeds or cr: The pathogen even remains in weeds or crop hosts.
translation.Old and stressed plants are more suscept: Old and stressed plants are more susceptible than healthy young plants.
translation.Avoid overcrowding of seedlings in the n: Avoid overcrowding of seedlings in the nursery, and check each for infection before field planting.
Control the weed host plants regularly.
translation.Provide proper aeration and light penetr: Provide proper aeration and light penetration with proper plant spacing without over-crowding.
translation.Do not apply excessive amounts of nitrog: Do not apply excessive amounts of nitrogen fertilizer because abundant leafy growth promotes favourable condition for disease development.
translation.Ensure plants with adequate amounts of w: Ensure plants with adequate amounts of water as moisture stress may increase susceptibility.
translation.Improve ventilation by proper pruning an: Improve ventilation by proper pruning and staking.
translation.Collect all the trash and burn or bury i: Collect all the trash and burn or bury it.
translation.Avoid over-lapping crops to prevent spor: Avoid over-lapping crops to prevent spores from older crops infecting newer ones at an early age.
translation.Practice crop rotation, choosing a non-h: Practice crop rotation, choosing a non-host crop, e.g., root crops or those in the cabbage family.
translation.It provides all essential inputs for inc: It provides all essential inputs for increasing the crop yield. Our team provides all inputs at the time of sowing and also provides method of using materials. There will be less loss and farmers will get benefited as the inputs from the team will provide knowledge for systematic crop cultivation. It provides knowledge for systematic crops cultivation, maximum land utilization and how to grow more then one crop over small area of land.

translation.We're AGRARIAN, a startup, whose objecti: We're AGRARIAN, a startup, whose objective is to bring change in the agriculture sector. We provide a specific platform to the farmers that help them to get all the modern information and sustainable ways regarding crop cultivation practices from sowing to harvesting.
